src/models/interfaces.ts.description: Added RegretMinimizationData interface with TimeHorizonRegret helper interface for the 10/10/10 framework (10 minutes, 10 months, 10 years). Includes futureSelfPerspective, potentialRegrets, and optional regretScore and timeHorizonAnalysis fields.

./src/tools/decideServer.ts.description: DecideServer uses framework-specific formatters that are called from formatOutput based on analysisType. The formatEisenhowerMatrix method groups options by quadrant (do-first, schedule, delegate, eliminate) and displays them with color-coded sections using chalk. Each framework-specific formatter returns a formatted string that gets appended to the main output.
